answerText: Blithe Spirit[10] Blithe Spirit is a play by this author of The Happy Breed and Private Lives.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 7 | 2 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this play, Ruth foreshadows a conflict by asking "Was she more physically attractive than I am?" about Elvira. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Madame Arcati summons the ghosts of Charles Condomine's two dead wives.
